short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads all installed extension IDs and compare with up-to-date macilous extension list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will scan all your installed extensions in your chrome browser and let you know if there is any malicious extension.
